name: Shroom (itch) (Flynny)
description:
Not all shrooms grow in the dark! Have you ever wanted to play a game where you own a small plot in a quiet town and begin using it to grow familiar and other-worldly mushrooms? In Shroom, you can do just that!

Disclaimer: This is a smaller, personal project I initially started to get a bit of practice in Unreal Engine. It's far from having actual gameplay, right now it's more a proof of concept or something like that. There's no audio in the game right now, and it doesn't have a title screen or pause menu.

Currently, there are 4 types of mushrooms in the game. See if you can obtain all 4 at the same time! 

Controls:

WASD - Movement
RMB - Inspect Farm Plot
Q - Plant (temp)
E - Pickup
I - Inventory

9 - Shop (debug)
